name: Subxml
short_description: Subxml provides a very lightweight C++ pull parser for parsing a subset of XML. It is intended for use in utility applications where the ability to parse XML-like configuration files is advantageous, but a fully compliant XML parser would be overkill.

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats :: XML
